bug.short_desc: Replace some of the tool/Makefile.release targets with Python/Generator jobs

long_desc.thetext:
The tool/Makefile.release offers a few interesting targets. Those are:
- source (create a source version of application/* and component/(apiviewer|testrunner)) - build (create a build version of application/* and component/(apiviewer|testrunner))
Those should be easy to re-create with pure generator features, and would be beneficial for those that could use the convenience of a batch job generating all important applications.
The other important target is
- release (create a release package, like "qooxdoo-0.8.1-sdk.zip")
This is actually harder to replace since it still uses rsync(?), zip and svn client commands.
